quartomatic

Quarto is an open-source scientific and technical publishing system often employed by analysts to organise and report outputs into various formats (HTML, Word, PDF). Often, in organisational settings and otherwise, users choose to customise the theming of reports—an area which is, in general, non-trivial. The quartomatic package aims to simplify this procedure, allowing users to interactively update and customise quarto templates.

Installation

You can install the development version of quartomatic from GitHub with:

`r # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("The-Kids-Biostats/quartomatic")
